00031 int Filesystem::decode_response_open(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00032   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload;
00033   size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len;
00034   int error = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00035 
00036   if (error != Error::OK)
00037     HT_THROW(error, "");
00038 
00039   return decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00040 }

00043 int Filesystem::decode_response_create(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00044   return decode_response_open(event_ptr);
00045 }

00048 size_t
00049 Filesystem::decode_response_read(EventPtr &event_ptr, void *dst, size_t len) {
00050   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload;
00051   size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len;
00052 
00053   int error = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00054 
00055   if (error != Error::OK)
00056     HT_THROW(error, "");
00057 
00058   // uint64_t offset =
00059   decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00060   uint32_t nread = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00061 
00062   if (nread == (uint32_t)-1)
00063     return 0;
00064 
00065   if (decode_remain < nread)
00066     HT_THROWF(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED, "%lu < %lu",
00067               (Lu)decode_remain, (Lu)nread);
00068 
00069   // PERF: We could just send back a pointer to msg here
00070   memcpy(dst, decode_ptr, nread);
00071 
00072   return nread;
00073 }

00078 size_t
00079 Filesystem::decode_response_read_header(EventPtr &event_ptr, uint64_t *offsetp,
00080                                         uint8_t **dstp) {
00081   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload;
00082   size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len;
00083 
00084   int error = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00085 
00086   if (error != Error::OK)
00087     HT_THROW(error, "");
00088 
00089   *offsetp = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00090   uint32_t amount = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00091 
00092   if (dstp)
00093     *dstp = (uint8_t *)decode_ptr;
00094 
00095   return amount;
00096 }

00110 Filesystem::decode_response_append(EventPtr &event_ptr, uint64_t *offsetp) {
00111   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload;
00112   size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len;
00113

00115

00117     HT_THROW(error, "");
00118 
00119   *offsetp = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);

00143 void
00144 Filesystem::decode_response_readdir(EventPtr &event_ptr,
00145                                     std::vector<String> &listing) {
00146   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload;
00147   size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len;
00148 
00149   int error = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00150 
00151   if (error != Error::OK)
00152     HT_THROW(error, "");
00153 
00154   listing.clear();
00155 
00156   uint32_t len = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00157   uint16_t slen;
00158 
00159   for (uint32_t i=0; i<len; i++) {
00160     const char *str = decode_str16(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain, &slen);
00161     listing.push_back(String(str, slen));
00162   }
00163 }

00169 Filesystem::decode_response_exists(EventPtr &event_ptr) {

00176     HT_THROW(error, "");
